metadata.name: Skinny flower dancing on guitar
metadata.description:
A music written and produced by Denis exclusively for the purpose of making a symbiosis with visuals made by Denis Kaznacheev as well. Over a 1000 frames which was rendering about a week.
After the purchasing you will get a full uncompressed HD version of the file (1920x1920), plus full length track, plus .blend file, plus the vinyl record by post to your country, plus NM_Key and plus a quartz rock with a chalcopyrite on it, found and cut by Denis - plus a free entrance to all of Nervmusic parties and showcases worldwide (NM_KEY).
